DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare time success rate four intubation device ( cardiopulmonary scenario uninterrupted chest compression standardize manikin model . The investigator hypothesize fiberoscope laryngoscope may improve success rate .
DOC.detailed_description: Devices use study : The Bonfils Intubation Fibrescope ( BONFILS ) ( KARL STORZ Endovision , Inc. , Charlton , MA , USA ) , The Video Rigid Flexing Laryngoscope ( RIFL ) ( AI Medical Devices , Inc. , Williamston , MI , USA ) , The C-MAC® S Video Laryngoscope Blade Mac # 3 ( C-MAC®S ) ( KARL STORZ Endovision , Inc. , Charlton , MA , USA ) The Macintosh Laryngoscope Blade . 3 ( MAC ) ( LifeLine Medical , Inc. , Brooksville , FL , USA ) .
DOC.criteria: experienced emergency personnel : nurse , paramedic experience outofhospital emergency medicine
